body: Plot twist: THEY R prostitudos! I am a freeloader. "When the wind is slow, and the fire's hot, the vulture waits to see what rots!"
I am a fellow freeloader.
Too bad there is so little of the milf. She is just YUMMY
Why did he pay if he was invited by her and why go thru all this for a confession?

sugoi
subarashi

@pearllurk She had no problem sharing him with others, why should he? And of course he's going to worry as he's interested in her...if anyone should worry about him being with other women, it should be her, not him. Moreover, he was more concerned with the idea she was selling herself, not just that she was with other guys.

In this comment section: dummies who can't infer information. The fact that she lied about being a prostitute and that being her first kiss means she's a virgin. I know it might be surprising to people down the hentai rabbit hole but girls bleeding during their first time 100% of the time is just a myth. Most of the time it happens if you don't get a girl wet enough. Also, I'm betting the last page has a translation error. Pretty sure the dude meant to say he wasn't lying and that he'd make her happy.
